component.name: Badge
component.description: Compact label for status, category, count, or metadata display.

useCases: Inline metadata alongside text or data rows

commonPatterns.name: status-badge
commonPatterns.description: Semantic status label with color variant

commonPatterns.name: badge-with-indicator
commonPatterns.description: Badge with a pulsing status dot

commonPatterns.name: badge-with-icon
commonPatterns.description: Badge with a leading icon for category labeling

commonPatterns.name: badge-with-avatar
commonPatterns.description: Badge showing a user avatar and name
commonPatterns.composition: <Badge variant="outline"><BadgeAvatar src="/avatar.jpg" alt="Jane" size="sm" /> Jane Doe</Badge>

commonPatterns.name: dismissible-badge
commonPatterns.description: Badge with a close/remove action button

antiPatterns.scenario: Using Badge as a clickable button
antiPatterns.reason: Badge is a display element; clickable actions need Button or a link
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Button with size='xs' for small interactive elements

antiPatterns.scenario: Using destructive variant for non-error content
antiPatterns.reason: Destructive communicates error or danger; misuse dilutes its meaning
antiPatterns.alternative: Use secondary or outline for neutral metadata

antiPatterns.scenario: Overloading a badge with too much text
antiPatterns.reason: Badges should be scannable at a glance; long text defeats the purpose
antiPatterns.alternative: Keep badge text under 3-4 words; use a tooltip or description for details

semanticMeaning.default: Primary-tinted accent badge for default emphasis
semanticMeaning.secondary: Muted neutral badge for low-emphasis metadata
semanticMeaning.outline: Bordered badge on card background for subtle labeling
semanticMeaning.ghost: No background; appears only on hover when linked

slots.icon: BadgeIcon for a leading icon element
slots.indicator: BadgeIndicator for a status dot with optional pulse animation
slots.delta: BadgeDelta for numeric change with up/down/neutral chevron
slots.action: BadgeAction for a small interactive button (e.g., dismiss)

interactions.linked: When rendered as an anchor (asChild), gains hover and focus styles
interactions.action: BadgeAction provides a small interactive dismiss/action target within the badge

responsive.mobile: Inline display; wraps with text flow
responsive.desktop: Inline display; wraps with text flow

accessibility.role: Rendered as span by default; inherits role from child when using asChild
accessibility.keyboardSupport: Not keyboard-interactive unless linked or containing BadgeAction; BadgeAction is focusable via Tab
accessibility.screenReader: Reads badge text content; BadgeIndicator and BadgeDelta icons are aria-hidden
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus ring on BadgeAction and linked badges via focus-visible

rules: Match variant to semantic meaning: success for positive, destructive for errors, warning for caution
Use BadgeIndicator for live status with optional pulse animation
BadgeDelta auto-selects chevron direction and color based on positive/negative/zero delta value
BadgeAvatar supports src for images or fallback for initials; size can be sm or md
Keep badge text concise â€” 1-4 words maximum
asChild prop allows rendering Badge as a different element via Radix Slot

aiHints.context: Use for compact inline status labels, category tags, or metadata chips. Choose variant based on semantic meaning. For interactive tag management (add/remove), combine with BadgeAction. For numeric change display, use BadgeDelta sub-component.
